page.title: 16CHURCHES IN PULBOROUGH
page.content: There are three churches in the village ;United Reform,R.C.,and the Anglican Parish Church of St.Mary.Much restoration work is currently in hand at St.Marys. The patron of the living Lord Egremont has commended an appeal fund this year. A team of young men engaged on the government's Youth Training Scheme are working under a skilled foreman to carry out much of the work.They supply the labour while the church pays for the materials.The table tombs, churchyard wall & lych gate need rebuilding,paths relaying water supplied for a new toilet facility,a ramp provided for wheel chair access and gas connected for a new boiler.In the church,the roof requires attention and the brasses are in need of restoration.They hope to raise Â£20,000 to restore the church for future generations to enjoy.
